name: FunkKit
overview:
FunkKit brings creative solutions for customizing and designing shoes.

The company combines technology, community and art to footwear by offering a new range of user-generated stick-on designs to customize shoes on a daily basis - FunkKit Stickers-for-Sneakers. Similar to skins for laptops, ipods and cellphones, FunkKit’s Stickers-for-Sneakers are easy to apply and remove. These stickers are not just any stickers, they are made of high-end material and technology.

FunkKit’s designs are based on a community of designers and artists who submit their designs which are then voted by rest of the community. FunkKit provides an opprtunity for designers to showcase their artwork on a platform striving to lead a new category of expression in global apparel.

FunkKit Stickers-for-Sneakers are currently distributed online and off in a diverse spectrum of retails stores, mall stands and as promotional campaigns.
